Jer, Greven is in a pit, so it'd be hard to run him over.

::Greven::

The grenade explodes in the hole, charring Greven's armor. He pulls
out a rifle and fires it at Surgital, though he was losing mechfluid
pretty quick.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Surgital::
> 
>      Surgital was aware of an attack from the fusion cannon, and
stepped to the side and avoided it.  Surgital shot a spinning saw
blade from his left hand at Cledar, meanwhile taking his elbow, and
instead of a net, firing a grenade, at Greven in the hole.
